apita mega natya kalawa andunwa dunne sirasaya.shanthi balannata gos daru pawul maragath hati api dakkemu.ganu murandu wi uyana eka nawathwa warjanaya karannata patan gath athara minissu wadi wadiyen bonnata purudu wuwoya.sirasen mulin genwuye indiyawe thuttu deke mega natyaya.eewa maw basin rasa ganwa ran depaya kiya kiya penwannata wiya.eyin rate buddhimath janathawa athara kalambaimak athi uwada bahuthara mugdha janaya eewa sadarayen piligena salaye rupa pettiya desa balagathwanama sitinnata huru wuwoya.meya danagath lankawe bohoma swalpa washayen inna horu nam jathiya gewal bindima sandaha ran depaya yoda gannata wuha.meki arbudhayen rata galawa ganima udesa buddhimath janathawage aprathihatha dhairyaya hamuwe rajayata kriyathmaka wimata sidu wiya.

es.dab.aar.di. bandaranayaka mathithuma samaga ma piyananda athulu eda siti nayakayin samaga ekwa 1951 di pihitu wu shri lanka nidahas pakshaya wishala jana balayak da wiwidha pragathishili paksha ha kandayam wala sahayada gaurawayada dinagath pakshayaki. 1951 sita me dakwa gatha wu deshapalana ithihasaye awastha gananawaka dima itha thiranathmaka mehewarak itu kala aandu pihituwalimata nayakathwaya dimata apa pakshayata haki wiya. 30 wasarak pawathi lowa darunuma thrasthawadaya nisa hatagath yuddhaya sansiduwa lankawata samaya gena eemata haki wima da 2/3 kata aasanna jana balayak sahitha aanduwak godanagimata apata haki wima da ma sihipath karanne shri lanka nidahas pakshaya wenuwen kapawu siyalu shri lanka nidahas pakshikayange abhimanaya pinisaya.
2017 pebarawari 10 thiragathawimata niyamithayi.

eya ese yayi api wishwasa kalemu. 9 wana parichchedaya – iwasima iganwima ebawin dharmishtakame wachanayata kikaru wimata kapawana lesath, obe aswalin oba daka athi (aadarshaya) paridi siyalu aakara iwasiliwanthakamen yukthawa sitina pinisath, aashirwada lath igneshas, sosimas saha rufas yana aya thula pamanak nowa, oba samaga sitinaaya atharath, pawulthuma thulath, anek prerithayan thula pawathi iwasima anugamanaya kirimata anushasana karami.
